attributes.action: Review the Mileage Allowance payments for employees using their car for business use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current figure of 40pence per mile (under 10K miles per annum) has been fixed since 2002. Fuel costs have risen considerably since then + employees are now not being fully recompensed for using their own vehicle for business use. 
Also, encourage 'alternative fuel' vehicles by increasing the payments per mile for alternative fuel vehicles. There are costs involved with buying these cars, so employees should be encouraged away from diesels + petrol vehicles.
